name: Arcane Pickaxe
description: The best mining tool in The Forge Roblox. This S+ tier pickaxe provides 100% luck chance, making it perfect for finding rare ores. **Detailed Acquisition Process:** Start by finding the Bard NPC at the spawn campfire area. Accept the 'Bard's Lost Guitar' quest. Travel to Stonewake Mine and locate Umut the Brave NPC. Search for a hidden hole in a bush near this NPC (look for a small opening behind the bush, slightly to the left). Enter the hole to find the guitar. Return it to the Bard to receive the Unknown Key. Next, locate the Fallen Angel's Cave entrance (it's a locked door near the spawn area, marked with ancient runes). Use the Unknown Key to unlock the cave. Inside, navigate through the cave (watch out for falling rocks) until you reach the inner chamber. The Arcane Pickaxe is displayed on a pedestal in the center. This pickaxe is essential for mining at depths above 400m and provides a massive advantage for gathering rare ores like Mithril, Demonite, and Luminite.

stats.acquisition: Fallen Angel's Cave (Requires Bard's Guitar Quest)

name: Unknown Key
description: A mysterious key obtained by completing the Bard's Lost Guitar quest. This key is used to unlock the Fallen Angel's Cave, where you can find the powerful Arcane Pickaxe. The quest involves finding the Bard's guitar in Stonewake Mine near Umut the Brave.

name: Stone Pickaxe
description: Basic mining pickaxe available at the start of The Forge. Can mine common ores like Stone and Coal. Upgrade to better pickaxes as you progress to mine deeper and rarer materials.

name: Iron Pickaxe
description: Upgraded pickaxe forged from Iron ore. Increases mining speed and allows access to deeper mining areas. Crafted using the manual forging minigame at the anvil using Iron ingots.

name: Golden Sword
description: A powerful sword forged from Gold ore in The Forge. Provides excellent damage for combat encounters. Requires mastering the 3-step manual forging minigame to craft. Essential for defeating enemies and progressing through quests.

name: Mithril Blade
description: Epic-tier weapon forged from Mithril ore. One of the strongest weapons available in The Forge. Requires advanced forging skills and rare materials. Highly sought after for end-game content.

name: Demonite Axe
description: Legendary weapon crafted from Demonite ore. Extremely powerful with devastating damage. Requires 12 Demonite Ingots (mined at 600-900m depth in Volcanic area). Must complete the 3-step manual forging minigame to achieve Masterwork quality. Essential for defeating the Goblin King and other end-game bosses.

name: Colossal Sword
description: The ultimate weapon in The Forge. A massive sword that requires Masterwork quality forging to create. Only the most skilled players can craft this legendary weapon. **Detailed Acquisition Process:** This is the most challenging weapon to craft in the game. First, you must have the Arcane Pickaxe and reach maximum mining depth (1000-1200 meters). Luminite ore is extremely rare and only spawns at these extreme depths. You'll need 15 Luminite Ingots total. Mining Luminite requires patience - it spawns in single-ore nodes, so you'll need to mine 15 separate nodes. Each node takes approximately 30-45 seconds to mine even with the Arcane Pickaxe. After gathering 15 Luminite Ore, smelt them into ingots at the furnace. Next, visit the Anvil and select 'Colossal Sword'. The forging minigame for this weapon is the most difficult - you must achieve flawless execution (zero timing error) on all three steps to create the weapon. Practice with cheaper materials first (Iron, Gold) to master the timing. The reward is worth it: this weapon has the highest damage in the game and is required for the 'Forge Master' end-game quest.

name: Gold Ore
description: Valuable ore found in The Forge mines. Gold is a rare material used for crafting powerful weapons and equipment. Found at depths starting from 150 meters. Essential for progression and trading.

name: Topaz
description: Precious gemstone used for quest tributes and crafting. Required for the Goblin King quest escalating tributes. Can be found while mining at various depths. Essential for accessing end-game content.

name: Ruby
description: Rare gemstone required for the final Goblin King tribute. One of the most valuable materials in The Forge. Found in deep mining areas. Essential for completing the Goblin King quest in the Forgotten Kingdom.

name: Platinum Ore
description: Rare ore found at deeper mining levels. Platinum is valuable for crafting high-tier equipment and weapons. Requires a good pickaxe and mining skills to obtain. Used in advanced forging recipes.

name: Mithril Ore
description: Epic-tier ore found at very deep mining levels. Mithril is essential for crafting powerful Epic weapons and armor. Requires advanced mining tools like the Arcane Pickaxe to efficiently extract. One of the most valuable crafting materials.

name: Demonite Ore
description: Legendary dark ore found at extreme depths. Demonite is one of the rarest materials in The Forge, used for crafting the most powerful Legendary weapons. **Detailed Location & Mining Process:** Demonite ore spawns exclusively at depths between 600-900 meters in the Volcanic Depths area. To mine efficiently, you must have the Arcane Pickaxe (obtained from Fallen Angel's Cave). Without it, mining Demonite with lower-tier pickaxes takes 10x longer. The ore appears as dark purple/black crystalline formations embedded in the walls. Look for clusters of 2-3 ores together - they're easier to spot in well-lit areas. Mining each ore takes approximately 20-30 seconds with the Arcane Pickaxe. Pro tip: Bring extra Coal for smelting, as you'll want to convert ores to ingots immediately to save inventory space. Demonite is essential for crafting the Demonite Axe, one of the most powerful weapons in the game. Plan your mining trip carefully - you'll need at least 12 ores (for one weapon), but we recommend gathering 20-30 for multiple attempts at Masterwork quality.

name: Titanium Ore
description: Extremely rare ore found at maximum depths. Titanium is a Legendary material used for crafting top-tier equipment. Requires maximum mining depth and powerful tools. Highly valuable for trading and crafting.

name: Adamantite Ore
description: Mythical ore found at near-maximum depths. Adamantite is one of the rarest materials in The Forge, required for crafting Mythical-tier equipment. Only obtainable with the best mining tools at extreme depths.

name: Luminite Ore
description: Godly-tier ore found at maximum depth. Luminite is the rarest and most valuable material in The Forge. Used for crafting the ultimate Godly-tier equipment. Requires reaching maximum mining depth with the Arcane Pickaxe.

name: Iron Ore
description: Common ore found in The Forge mines. Iron is essential for crafting basic to intermediate weapons and tools. Found at relatively shallow depths, making it accessible early in the game. Used for upgrading equipment and pickaxes.

name: Copper Ore
description: Basic ore found early in mining areas. Copper is one of the first ores players encounter in The Forge. Used for basic crafting recipes and as starting materials. Essential for learning the forging mechanics.

name: Silver Ore
description: Uncommon ore found at moderate depths. Silver is used for crafting intermediate weapons and equipment. Provides a good balance between value and accessibility. Important for mid-game progression in The Forge.

name: Coal Ore
description: Common fuel ore found throughout the mines. Coal is used for smelting operations and can be found at very shallow depths. Essential for the forging process, allowing players to smelt raw ores into ingots for crafting.

name: Cobalt Ore
description: Uncommon ore found in the Forgotten Kingdom. Used for strengthening weapons.

name: Diamond
description: Rare gem used as a high-multiplier filler for crafting powerful weapons.

name: Obsidian
description: Dense, dark volcanic glass. Adds significant defense properties to forged equipment.

name: Emerald
description: Vibrant green gem known for its magical conductivity. High value.

name: Uranium
description: Dangerous radioactive ore. Weapons forged with Uranium inflict poison DoT.

name: Rivalite
description: Legendary ore that sharply increases critical hit chance.

name: Eye Ore
description: A disturbing, organic-looking ore. Grants massive power ('Glass Cannon') at the cost of the wielder's life force.

name: Fireite
description: Burning ore that imbues weapons with the power to ignite enemies.

name: Lightite
description: Mythical ore that feels weightless. Grants immense speed ('Velocity') to the wielder.

name: Magmaite
description: Legendary ore pulsing with heat. Causes explosive AoE blasts on weapon impact.

name: Darkryte
description: Mythical shadow ore. Allows the wielder to slip into shadow, evading attacks.

name: Galaxite
description: Divine ore containing the cosmos. Offers the highest possible scaling for weapons.

name: Stonewake's Pickaxe
description: A reliable B-tier pickaxe available early in World 1. Perfect for beginners starting their mining journey. Can be purchased from the Inner Cave shop for $3,333.

name: Mythril Pickaxe
description: An A-tier pickaxe with excellent power and luck stats. Great mid-game option for serious miners. Provides 55% luck chance for finding rare ores.

name: Lightite Pickaxe
description: High-tier A-tier pickaxe with excellent luck stats. One of the best pickaxes available from the shop. Provides 62% luck chance, perfect for finding rare World 2 ores.

name: Magma Pickaxe
description: Powerful A-tier pickaxe with high power rating. Found in the hidden area of the Forgotten Kingdom. Requires exploration and completion of quests to access.

name: Demonic Pickaxe
description: The ultimate S+ tier pickaxe with the highest power rating. Requires Demon race to acquire. Extremely powerful mining tool for end-game content in World 2.

stats.acquisition: Volcanic Depths Hidden Room (Requires Demon Race)

name: Snow Pickaxe
description: Essential pickaxe for the Winter Expansion. Required to break the ice barrier protecting the Prismatic Pickaxe. Has sufficient Mining Power (320+) to pass the stat check.

name: Prismatic Pickaxe
description: The best mining tool in The Forge Roblox (Winter Expansion). S+ tier pickaxe with 72% luck and 4 rune slots, making it perfect for finding rare ores like Iceite and Snowite. Requires passing the 320 Mining Power stat check to unlock from the ice barrier. Location: Inside the Mosasaurus chamber at the bottom of the Frozen Lake (behind Bjorn's House). Cost: 2,000,000 Gold. Note: You need the Snow Pickaxe (750k Gold, 320 Power) to break the ice first.

stats.acquisition: Frostspire Expanse - Mosasaurus Chamber ($2,000,000, requires 320+ Mining Power to unlock)

name: Miner Shard
description: Utility rune that increases Luck, Mining Speed, or Mining Power. Essential for optimizing your mining efficiency. Drops from Delver Zombies.

stats.effect: Increases Luck, Mining Speed, or Mining Power

name: Drain Edge
description: Sustain rune that provides lifesteal, healing you for 5-15% of damage dealt. Perfect for combat builds that need survivability. Drops from Brute Zombies.

stats.effect: Lifesteal: Heals for 5-15% of damage dealt

name: Blast Chip
description: Damage rune that provides a chance to deal AoE explosion damage. Great for clearing groups of enemies quickly. Drops from Delver Zombies.

stats.effect: Chance to deal AoE explosion damage

name: Flame Spark
description: Damage rune that inflicts burn damage over time. Perfect for dealing continuous damage to enemies. Drops from Elite Zombies.

name: Frost Speck
description: Control rune that provides a chance to freeze enemies. Excellent for crowd control and surviving tough encounters. Drops from Elite Zombies.
